items.description: Names of the authors of the entry.

author_prerelease_sequence_status.description: The prerelease status for the molecular sequences for the entry .

deposit_date_coordinates.description: The deposition date of entry coordinate data.

deposit_date_nmr_restraints.description: The deposition date of entry NMR restraint data.

deposit_date_structure_factors.description: The deposition date of entry structure factor data.

hold_date_coordinates.description: The embargo date of entry coordinate data.

hold_date_nmr_restraints.description: The embargo date of entry NMR restraint data.

hold_date_structure_factors.description: The embargo date of entry structure factor data.

release_date.description: The release date for the entry.

status_code.description: The release status for the entry.

update_id.description: Identifier for the current data exchange status record.

title: schema: repository_holdings collection: repository_holdings_unreleased version: 1.1.0
description: RCSB Exchange Database JSON schema derived from the repository_holdings content type schema. This schema supports collection repository_holdings_unreleased version 1.1.0. This schema is hosted in repository https://github.com/rcsb/py-rcsb.db/tree/master/rcsb.db/data/json-schema/json-schema-min-repository_holdings_unreleased.json and follows JSON schema specification version 4
